snippet.title: Pixel Ripped 1989 Teaser - Coming 31st of July 2018 for  PSVR OCULUS HTC VIVE WINDOWS MR! by ARVORE
snippet.description:
Check out Pixel Ripped 1989! coming out on July 31st 2018 for Oculus, PSVR, Windows Mixed Reality and HTC VIVE!
PlayStation Store:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4906-CUSA12322_00-6663429942732996
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/577530/Pixel_Ripped_1989/
Oculus Store:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/415780415213995/

Pixel Ripped 1989 http://www.pixelripped.com/about/ 
Published by ARVORE (http://arvore.io)

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pixelripped/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pixelripped
Tumblr: https://pixelripped.tumblr.com/

Help our hero Dot and her pixelated friends save the world by facing classic 1980s gaming challenges through the skilled hands of 2nd-grade student Nicola, as she plays her favorite game in class. But watch out - the edges of the console screen will not stop the evil Cyblin Lord!
